title: RCMP seek help to locate missing 14-year-old Moncton girl
description: Police are asking for the public's help to locate 14-year-old Faith Rourke of Moncton.
content: Codiac Regional RCMP are asking for the public s help to locate year old Faith Rourke of Moncton Rourke was last seen March at around p m on Mapleton Road She is five foot two and weighs about pounds She has blond hair and browns eyes Poli chars
